from TRANCHECK_PLATFORM
order by ${orderByClause}

ID,

mapper.update:
update TRANCHECK_PLATFORM
PLATFORM_TYPE = #{platformType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATFORM_NUM = #{platformNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TECHNOLOGY_ADDRESS = #{technologyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TECHNOLOGY_AMT = #{technologyAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TECHNOLOGY_FEE = #{technologyFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLEAR_ADDRESS = #{clearAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLEAR_AMT = #{clearAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLEAR_FEE = #{clearFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TRANCHECK_PLATFORM set PLATFORM_TYPE = #{platformType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM_NUM = #{platformNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TECHNOLOGY_ADDRESS = #{technologyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TECHNOLOGY_AMT = #{technologyAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TECHNOLOGY_FEE = #{technologyFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLEAR_ADDRESS = #{clearAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLEAR_AMT = #{clearAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLEAR_FEE = #{clearFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: select distinct PLATFORM_TYPE from TRANCHECK_PLATFORM ORDER BY PLATFORM_TYPE

select nvl((select sum(IN_TRANS_AMT)from TRANS_PROFIT_DETAIL where PROFIT_DATE=#{tranMonth} and SOURCE_INFO='MPOS')+(select sum(TRANS_AMT)from P_PROFIT_DIRECT where TRANS_MONTH=#{tranMonth}),0) as MPOS_TRAN_AMT, nvl((select sum(TRANS_FEE)from TRANS_PROFIT_DETAIL where PROFIT_DATE=#{tranMonth} and SOURCE_INFO='MPOS')+(select sum(TRANS_FEE)from P_PROFIT_DIRECT where TRANS_MONTH=#{tranMonth}),0) as TRANS_FEE from dual
